scripts.build-deps: yarn workspace @apicize/definitions build && yarn workspace @apicize/engine build && yarn workspace @apicize/toolkit build
scripts.watch-deps: concurrently "yarn workspace @apicize/definitions watch" "yarn workspace @apicize/engine watch" "yarn workspace @apicize/toolkit watch"
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace @apicize/definitions watch" "yarn workspace @apicize/engine watch" "yarn workspace @apicize/toolkit watch" "yarn run build-deps && yarn workspace @apicize/ui tauri dev"
